additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: INGREDIENTS: Vine Fruits (36.5%) (Sultanas, Raisins, Currants), Sugar, Brandy (9%), Cider (8.5%) (Preservative (224)), Non Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil (Palm Oil, Rice Flour, Sunflower Oil), Breadcrumb (Wheat Flour, Salt, Yeast, Anticaking Agent (Calcium Carbonate)), Wheat Flour, Humectant (422), Port (Preservative (Sulphur Dioxide)), Candied Mixed Peel (Orange Peel, Glucose-fructose Syrup, Lemon Peel, Sugar, Acidity Regulator (330), Preservative (Sulphur Dioxide)), Treacle, Orange Juice from Concentrate, Molasses, Mixed Spice, Salt, Orange Oil. Contains 1.7mL of alcohol per 100g of pudding.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Contain Walnut, May Contain Macadamia Nuts, May Contain Hazelnuts, May Contain Brazil Nuts, May Contain Almonds, Contains Gluten, Contains Wheat, May Contain Pecan

description: Indulgence in a taste of the traditional this Christmas. Our matured pudding is made with juicy vine fruits and a hint of cider and rum, before being matured for 9 months to give a rich, intense flavour.
name: Festive Matured Christmas Pudding Small
